Name: DOSCALLS
Comment: Export definitions for DOSCALLS.H which is a C++ OS/2 library for DOS APIs

Exports.name: DOSCWAIT
Exports.Signature: USHORT rc = DosCwait(USHORT ActionCode, USHORT WaitOption, PRESULTCODES ReturnCodes, PPID ProcessIDWord, PID ProcessID);
Comments: Places the current thread in a wait state until an asynchronous child process ends.
When the process ends, its process ID and termination code are returned to the caller.

Exports.name: DOSENTERCRITSEC
Comments: Disables thread switching for the current process.

Exports.name: DOSEXIT
Comments: Ends the current thread or process.

Exports.name: DOSEXITCRITSEC
Comments: Re-enables thread switching for the current process.

Exports.name: DOSEXITLIST
Comments: Maintains a list of routines to be executed when the current process ends.

Exports.name: DOSGETINFOSEG
Comments: Returns the selectors for the global and local information segments.

Exports.name: DOSGETPRTY
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosGetPrty(USHORT Scope, PUSHORT Priority, USHORT ID);
Comments: Returns the priority of a thread, process, or process tree.

Exports.name: DOSKILLPROCESS
Comments: Terminates a process or a process tree.

Exports.name: DOSKILLPROCESS
Comments: Terminates a process or a process tree.

Exports.name: DOSPTRACE
Comments: Provides a debugging interface for process control.

Exports.name: DOSHOLDSIGNAL
Comments: Enables or disables signal processing for the current process.

Exports.name: DOSSETSIGHANDLER
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosSetSigHandler(PFNSIGRoutine RoutineAddress, PFNSIGRoutine PrevAddress, PUSHORT PrevAction, USHORT Action, USHORT SigNumber);
Comments: Registers a signal handler for the current process.

Exports.name: DOSFLAGPROCESS
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosFlagProcess(PID PID, USHORT Scope, USHORT FlagNum, USHORT FlagArg);
Comments: Sets a process flag.

Exports.name: DOSMAKEPIPE
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosMakePipe(PHANDLE ReadHandle, PHANDLE WriteHandle, USHORT PipeSize);
Comments: Creates an anonymous pipe.

Exports.name: DOSSEMSETWAIT
Comments: Sets a semaphore and waits for it to be cleared.

Exports.name: DOSMUXSEMWAIT
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosMuxSemWait(PUSHORT IndexN, PVOID ListAddr, LONG Timeout);
Comments: Waits for one or more semaphores to be cleared.

Exports.name: DOSCLOSESEM
Comments: Closes a semaphore.

Exports.name: DOSCREATESEM
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosCreateSem(USHORT NoExclusive, PHSEM SemHandle, PSZ SemName);
Comments: Creates a semaphore.

Exports.name: DOSOPENSEM
Comments: Opens an existing semaphore.

Exports.name: DOSRESUMETHREAD
Comments: Resumes a suspended thread.

Exports.name: DOSSUSPENDTHREAD
Comments: Suspends a thread.

Exports.name: DOSSETDATETIME
Comments: Sets the system date and time.

Exports.name: DOSTIMERASYNC
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosTimerAsync(ULONG TimeInterval, HSEM SemHandle, PHTIMER TimerHandle);
Comments: Starts an asynchronous timer.

Exports.name: DOSTIMERSTART
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosTimerStart(ULONG TimeInterval, HSEM SemHandle, PHTIMER TimerHandle);
Comments: Starts a periodic timer.

Exports.name: DOSTIMERSTOP
Comments: Stops a timer.

Exports.name: DOSTIMERSTOP
Comments: Stops a timer.

Exports.name: DOSSLEEP
Comments: Suspends the current thread for a specified amount of time.

Exports.name: DOSGETDATETIME
Comments: Returns the current system date and time.

Exports.name: DOSALLOCSEG
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosAllocSeg(USHORT Size, PSEL Selector, USHORT Flags);
Comments: Allocates a segment of memory.

Exports.name: DOSALLOCSHRSEG
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosAllocShrSeg(USHORT Size, PSZ Name, PSEL Selector);
Comments: Allocates a shared segment of memory.

Exports.name: DOSGETSHRSEG
Comments: Returns a selector for an existing shared segment.

Exports.name: DOSGIVESEG
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosGiveSeg(SEL Selector, PID ProcessID, PSEL NewSelector);
Comments: Gives a segment to another process.

Exports.name: DOSREALLOCSEG
Comments: Changes the size of a previously allocated segment.

Exports.name: DOSFREESEG
Comments: Frees a segment of memory.

Exports.name: DOSALLOCHUGE
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosAllocHuge(USHORT NumSegs, USHORT LastSegSize, PSEL Selector, USHORT MaxSegs, USHORT Flags);
Comments: Allocates a multiple-segment memory block.

Exports.name: DOSGETHUGESHIFT
Comments: Returns the increment used to calculate selectors for a multiple-segment block.

Exports.name: DOSREALLOCHUGE
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosReallocHuge(USHORT NumSegs, USHORT LastSegSize, SEL Selector);
Comments: Changes the size of a multiple-segment block.

Exports.name: DOSCREATECSALIAS
Comments: Creates a code segment alias for a data segment.

Exports.name: DOSLOADMODULE
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosLoadModule(PSZ ObjLibName, USHORT ObjLibNameLen, PSZ ModuleName, PHMODULE ModuleHandle);
Comments: Loads a dynamic-link module.

Exports.name: DOSGETPROCADDR
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosGetProcAddr(HMODULE ModuleHandle, PSZ ProcName, PFN *ProcAddress);
Comments: Returns the address of a procedure within a dynamic-link module.

Exports.name: DOSFREEMODULE
Comments: Frees a dynamic-link module.

Exports.name: DOSGETMODHANDLE
Comments: Returns the handle of a dynamic-link module.

Exports.name: DOSGETMODNAME
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosGetModName(HMODULE ModuleHandle, USHORT BufferLen, PSZ Buffer);
Comments: Returns the name of a dynamic-link module.

Exports.name: DOSGETMACHINEMODE
Comments: Returns the current processor mode.

Exports.name: DOSBEEP
Comments: Generates a sound from the system speaker.

Exports.name: DOSCLIACCESS
Comments: Requests permission to use CLI and STI instructions.

Exports.name: DOSDEVCONFIG
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosDevConfig(PVOID DeviceInfo, USHORT Item, USHORT Reserved);
Comments: Returns information about the system configuration.

Exports.name: DOSDEVIOCTL
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosDevIOCtl(PVOID Data, PVOID Parms, USHORT Function, USHORT Category, HFILE Handle);
Comments: Performs a device control function.

Exports.name: DOSBUFRESET
Comments: Flushes the file buffers.

Exports.name: DOSCHDIR
Comments: Changes the current directory for the process.

Exports.name: DOSCHGFILEPTR
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosChgFilePtr(HFILE Handle, LONG Offset, USHORT Type, PULONG NewOffset);
Comments: Moves the file pointer for a managed file.

Exports.name: DOSCLOSE
Comments: Closes a managed file handle.

Exports.name: DOSDELETE
Comments: Deletes a file.

Exports.name: DOSDUPHANDLE
Comments: Duplicates a managed file handle.

Exports.name: DOSFILELOCKS
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosFileLocks(HFILE Handle, PLONG UnlockRange, PLONG LockRange);
Comments: Locks or unlocks a range of bytes in a file.

Exports.name: DOSFINDCLOSE
Comments: Closes a directory search handle.

Exports.name: DOSFINDFIRST
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosFindFirst(PSZ FileName, PHDIR DirHandle, USHORT Attribute, PVOID ResultBuffer, USHORT ResultBufferLen, PUSHORT SearchCount, ULONG Reserved);
Comments: Starts a directory search.

Exports.name: DOSFINDNEXT
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosFindNext(HDIR DirHandle, PVOID ResultBuffer, USHORT ResultBufferLen, PUSHORT SearchCount);
Comments: Continues a directory search.

Exports.name: DOSMKDIR
Comments: Creates a new directory.

Exports.name: DOSMOVE
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosMove(PSZ OldPathName, PSZ NewPathName, ULONG Reserved);
Comments: Moves or renames a file or directory.

Exports.name: DOSNEWSIZE
Comments: Changes the size of a managed file.

Exports.name: DOSPORTACCESS
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosPortAccess(USHORT Reserved, USHORT Type, USHORT FirstPort, USHORT LastPort);
Comments: Requests or releases access to a range of I/O ports.

Exports.name: DOSOPEN
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosOpen(PSZ FileName, PHFILE Handle, PUSHORT ActionTaken, ULONG FileSize, USHORT FileAttribute, USHORT OpenFlag, USHORT OpenMode, ULONG Reserved);
Comments: Opens or creates a file.

Exports.name: DOSQCURDIR
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosQCurDir(USHORT DriveNumber, PSZ DirectoryPath, PUSHORT DirectoryPathLen);
Comments: Returns the current directory for a drive.

Exports.name: DOSQCURDISK
Comments: Returns the current drive for the process.

Exports.name: DOSQFHANDSTATE
Comments: Returns the state of a managed file handle.

Exports.name: DOSQFILEINFO
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosQFileInfo(HFILE Handle, USHORT InfoLevel, PVOID InfoBuffer, USHORT InfoBufferLen);
Comments: Returns information about a managed file.

Exports.name: DOSQFILEMODE
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosQFileMode(PSZ FileName, PUSHORT Attribute, ULONG Reserved);
Comments: Returns the attributes of a file.

Exports.name: DOSQFSINFO
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosQFSInfo(USHORT DriveNumber, USHORT InfoLevel, PVOID InfoBuffer, USHORT InfoBufferLen);
Comments: Returns information about a file system.

Exports.name: DOSQHANDTYPE
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosQHandType(HFILE Handle, PUSHORT HandType, PUSHORT DeviceAttr);
Comments: Returns the type of a managed file handle.

Exports.name: DOSQVERIFY
Comments: Returns the state of the system verify flag.

Exports.name: DOSRMDIR
Comments: Removes an empty directory.

Exports.name: DOSSELECTDISK
Comments: Changes the current drive for the process.

Exports.name: DOSSETFHANDSTATE
Comments: Sets the state of a managed file handle.

Exports.name: DOSSETFILEINFO
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosSetFileInfo(HFILE Handle, USHORT InfoLevel, PVOID InfoBuffer, USHORT InfoBufferLen);
Comments: Sets information for a managed file.

Exports.name: DOSSETFILEMODE
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosSetFileMode(PSZ FileName, USHORT Attribute, ULONG Reserved);
Comments: Sets the attributes of a file.

Exports.name: DOSSETMAXFH
Comments: Sets the maximum number of file handles for the process.

Exports.name: DOSSETVERIFY
Comments: Sets system read-after-write flag

Exports.name: DOSSYSTEMSERVICE
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosSystemService(USHORT Category, PVOID Request, PVOID Response);
Comments: Direct access to system services.

Exports.name: DOSSETVEC
Exports.Signature: USHORT rc = DosSetVec(USHORT VecNum, PFN Routine, PFN PrevAddress);
Comments: Registers handler for hardware exception
The DosSetVec process is analogous to setting an address in the interrupt vector table when running in 8086 mode.

Exports.name: DOSSYSTRACE
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosSysTrace(USHORT Major, USHORT Minor, USHORT Length, PVOID Data);
Comments: Adds a trace record to the system trace buffer.

Exports.name: DOSGETENV
Comments: Returns the selector of the process environment and the offset to the command line.

Exports.name: DOSGETVERSION
Comments: Returns the DOS version number.

Exports.name: DOSGETPID
Comments: Returns the process, thread, and parent process identifiers.

Exports.name: DOSOPEN2
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosOpen2(PSZ FileName, PHFILE Handle, PUSHORT ActionTaken, ULONG FileSize, USHORT FileAttribute, USHORT OpenFlag, USHORT OpenMode, PEAOP EAOP, ULONG Reserved);
Comments: Opens or creates a file with extended attributes.

Exports.name: DOSLIBINIT
Comments: Initializes a dynamic link library.

Exports.name: DOSSETFSINFO
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosSetFSInfo(USHORT DriveNumber, USHORT InfoLevel, PVOID InfoBuffer, USHORT InfoBufferLen);
Comments: Sets information for a file system.

Exports.name: DOSQPATHINFO
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosQPathInfo(PSZ PathName, USHORT InfoLevel, PVOID InfoBuffer, USHORT InfoBufferLen, ULONG Reserved);
Comments: Returns information about a file or directory path.

Exports.name: DOSDEVIOCTL2
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosDevIOCtl2(PVOID Data, USHORT DataLen, PVOID Parms, USHORT ParmsLen, USHORT Function, USHORT Category, HFILE Handle);
Comments: Performs a generic I/O control operation on a device with data/parameter buffers.

Exports.name: DOSSETPATHINFO
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosSetPathInfo(PSZ PathName, USHORT InfoLevel, PVOID InfoBuffer, USHORT InfoBufferLen, USHORT Flags, ULONG Reserved);
Comments: Sets information for a file or directory path.

Exports.name: DOSERROR
Comments: Enables or disables hard-error and exception handling.

Exports.name: DOSGETSEG
Comments: Returns the handle of a shared memory segment.

Exports.name: DOSLOCKSEG
Comments: Locks a discardable segment in memory.

Exports.name: DOSUNLOCKSEG
Comments: Unlocks a discardable segment in memory.

Exports.name: DOSSIZESEG
Comments: Returns the size of a memory segment.

Exports.name: DOSMEMAVAIL
Comments: Returns the size of the largest free block of memory.

Exports.name: DOSPHYSICALDISK
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosPhysicalDisk(USHORT Function, PVOID Data, USHORT DataLen, PVOID Parms, USHORT ParmsLen);
Comments: Returns information about partitionable disks.

Exports.name: DOSGETCP
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosGetCp(USHORT Length, PUSHORT CpList, PUSHORT CpCount);
Comments: Returns the code page list for the process.

Exports.name: DOSSENDSIGNAL
Comments: Sends a signal to a process.

Exports.name: DOSHUGESHIFT
Comments: Returns the left shift count used to compute selectors for huge segments.

Exports.name: DOSHUGEINCR
Comments: Returns the value to be added to a selector to compute the next selector of a huge segment.

Exports.name: DOSREAD
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosRead(HFILE Handle, PVOID Buffer, USHORT BufferLen, PUSHORT BytesRead);
Comments: Reads bytes from a managed file handle.

Exports.name: DOSWRITE
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosWrite(HFILE Handle, PVOID Buffer, USHORT BufferLen, PUSHORT BytesWritten);
Comments: Writes bytes to a managed file handle.

Exports.name: DOSERRCLASS
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosErrClass(USHORT Code, PUSHORT Class, PUSHORT Action, PUSHORT Locus);
Comments: Returns the error class, action, and locus for a given error code.

Exports.name: DOSSEMREQUEST
Comments: Requests a system semaphore.

Exports.name: DOSSEMCLEAR
Comments: Releases a system semaphore.

Exports.name: DOSSEMWAIT
Comments: Waits for a system semaphore to be cleared.

Exports.name: DOSSEMSET
Comments: Sets a system semaphore.

Exports.name: DOSEXECPGM
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosExecPgm(PCHAR ObjNameBuf, USHORT ObjNameBufLen, USHORT Flags, PSZ Args, PSZ Envs, PRESULTCODES ResultCodes, PSZ PgmName);
Comments: Executes a program as a child process.

Exports.name: DOSCREATETHREAD
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosCreateThread(PFNTHREAD ThreadAddr, PTID ThreadID, PBYTE ThreadStack);
Comments: Creates a new thread of execution within the current process.

Exports.name: DOSSUBSET
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosSubSet(SEL Selector, USHORT Flags, USHORT Size);
Comments: Initializes a segment for suballocation.

Exports.name: DOSSUBALLOC
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosSubAlloc(SEL Selector, PUSHORT Offset, USHORT Size);
Comments: Allocates memory from a suballocated segment.

Exports.name: DOSSUBFREE
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosSubFree(SEL Selector, USHORT Offset, USHORT Size);
Comments: Frees memory in a suballocated segment.

Exports.name: DOSREADASYNC
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosReadAsync(HFILE Handle, PULONG RamSem, PUSHORT RetCode, PVOID Buffer, USHORT BufferLen, PUSHORT BytesRead);
Comments: Reads bytes from a managed file handle asynchronously.

Exports.name: DOSWRITEASYNC
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosWriteAsync(HFILE Handle, PULONG RamSem, PUSHORT RetCode, PVOID Buffer, USHORT BufferLen, PUSHORT BytesWritten);
Comments: Writes bytes to a managed file handle asynchronously.

Exports.name: DOSSEARCHPATH
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosSearchPath(USHORT Control, PSZ PathRef, PSZ FileName, PBYTE ResultBuf, USHORT ResultBufLen);
Comments: Searches a path for a file.

Exports.name: DOSSCANENV
Comments: Searches the process environment for a variable.

Exports.name: DOSSETCP
Comments: Sets the code page for the process.

Exports.name: DOSGETRESOURCE
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosGetResource(HMODULE ModHandle, USHORT TypeID, USHORT ResID, PSEL Selector);
Comments: Returns the selector of a resource.

Exports.name: DOSGETPPID
Comments: Returns the parent process identifier for a given process.

Exports.name: DOSCALLBACK
Comments: Allows a Ring 3 process to be called from Ring 0 (Device Driver).

Exports.name: DOSR2STACKREALLOC
Comments: Reallocates the Ring 2 stack.

Exports.name: DOSFSRAMSEMREQUEST
Comments: Requests a RAM semaphore for file system access.

Exports.name: DOSFSRAMSEMCLEAR
Comments: Releases a RAM semaphore for file system access.

Exports.name: DOSQAPPTYPE
Comments: Returns the application type (Windowed, Fullscreen, etc.) for an executable.

Exports.name: DOSSETPROCCP
Comments: Sets the code page for the process and its descendants.

Exports.name: DOSDYNAMICTRACE
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosDynamicTrace(USHORT Major, USHORT Minor, USHORT Length, PVOID Data);
Comments: Adds a dynamic trace record.

Exports.name: DOSQSYSINFO
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosQSysInfo(USHORT Index, PVOID Buffer, USHORT BufferLen);
Comments: Returns system information.

Exports.name: DOSFSATTACH
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosFSAttach(PSZ DeviceName, PSZ FSDName, PVOID DataBuffer, USHORT DataBufferLen, USHORT OpFlag);
Comments: Attaches/detaches a drive or device to/from a File System Driver.

Exports.name: DOSQFSATTACH
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosQFSAttach(PSZ DeviceName, USHORT Ordinal, USHORT InfoLevel, PVOID DataBuffer, PUSHORT DataBufferLen);
Comments: Returns information about an attached file system.

Exports.name: DOSFSCTL
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosFSCtl(PVOID DataBuffer, USHORT DataBufferLen, PUSHORT DataCount, PVOID ParmBuffer, USHORT ParmBufferLen, PUSHORT ParmCount, USHORT Function, PSZ RouteName, HFILE Handle);
Comments: Provides an interface to a File System Driver.

Exports.name: DOSFINDFIRST2
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosFindFirst2(PSZ FileName, PHDIR DirHandle, USHORT Attribute, PVOID ResultBuffer, USHORT ResultBufferLen, PUSHORT SearchCount, USHORT InfoLevel, ULONG Reserved);
Comments: Starts a directory search with extended attributes or file information levels.

Exports.name: DOSMKDIR2
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosMkDir2(PSZ DirName, USHORT InfoLevel, PVOID InfoBuffer, ULONG Reserved);
Comments: Creates a directory with extended attributes.

Exports.name: DOSFILEIO
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosFileIO(HFILE Handle, PVOID CommandList, USHORT CommandListLen, PUSHORT ErrorOffset);
Comments: Performs multiple file I/O operations (Lock, Unlock, Seek, Read, Write) in a single atomic call.

Exports.name: DOSFINDNOTIFYCLOSE
Comments: Closes a directory change notification handle.

Exports.name: DOSFINDNOTIFYFIRST
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosFindNotifyFirst(PSZ FileName, PHDIR Handle, USHORT Attribute, PVOID Buffer, USHORT BufferLen, PUSHORT SearchCount, USHORT InfoLevel, ULONG Timeout);
Comments: Starts a directory change notification request.

Exports.name: DOSFINDNOTIFYNEXT
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosFindNotifyNext(HDIR Handle, PVOID Buffer, USHORT BufferLen, PUSHORT SearchCount, USHORT InfoLevel, ULONG Timeout);
Comments: Requests the next directory change notification.

Exports.name: DOSEDITNAME
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosEditName(USHORT EditLevel, PSZ SourceString, PSZ EditString, PBYTE TargetBuffer, USHORT TargetBufferLen);
Comments: Edits a file or directory name using global file name characters.

Exports.name: DOSLOGREGISTER
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosLogRegister(PVOID Buffer, USHORT BufferLen, PUSHORT LogHandle);
Comments: Registers a process for logging.

Exports.name: DOSLOGREAD
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosLogRead(USHORT LogHandle, PVOID Buffer, USHORT BufferLen, PUSHORT BytesRead);
Comments: Reads from the system log.

Exports.name: DOSCOPY
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosCopy(PSZ SourceName, PSZ TargetName, USHORT OpMode, ULONG Reserved);
Comments: Copies a file or directory.

Exports.name: DOSFORCEDELETE
Comments: Deletes a file, even if it has the read-only attribute set.

Exports.name: DOSENUMATTRIBUTE
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosEnumAttribute(USHORT RefType, PVOID FileHandle, ULONG Entry, PVOID Buffer, ULONG BufferLen, PULONG Count, USHORT InfoLevel, ULONG Reserved);
Comments: Enumerates the extended attributes of a file or directory.

Exports.name: DOSSHUTDOWN
Comments: Prepares the file system for a system shutdown.

Exports.name: DOSGETRESOURCE2
Exports.Signature: USHORT DosGetResource2(HMODULE ModHandle, USHORT TypeID, USHORT ResID, PSEL Selector);
Comments: Returns the selector of a resource, similar to DosGetResource but used in newer OS/2 versions.

Exports.name: DOSFREERESOURCE
Comments: Frees a resource previously obtained with DosGetResource or DosGetResource2.
